## Title

Analysis of the NOAA's Storm Database to determine which types of events are most harmful with respect to public health, and to determine which type of events have the greatest economic consequences. (_Events in this database refer to Storms or any other type of severe weather events, like floods, hurricanes, land slides, and many more_)
